briefTitle: Remicade Study in Psoriatic Arthritis Patients Of Methotrexate-Naïve Disease (RESPOND) (Study P04422)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Multicenter, International, Open-label Study of Infliximab Plus Methotrexate Versus Methotrexate (MTX) Alone for the Treatment of MTX naïve Subjects With Active Psoriatic Arthritis
summary: This study is undertaken to compare the efficacy and onset of action of infliximab plus methotrexate (IFX + MTX) versus methotrexate alone (MTX) in methotrexate naïve active psoriatic arthritis patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects Achieving ACR20 (at Least 20% Improvement in American College of Rheumatology Criteria From Baseline) at Week 16
